 9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_CXX0X_HPP
10#define VSIP_CORE_CXX0X_HPP
11
12namespace vsip
13{
14namespace impl
15{
16
17template <bool B, typename T = void>
18struct enable_if_c { typedef T type;};
19
20template <typename T>
21struct enable_if_c<false, T> {};
22
23/// Define a nested type if some predicate holds.
24template <typename C, typename T = void>
25struct enable_if : public enable_if_c<C::value, T> {};
26
27/// A conditional expression, but for types. If true, first, if false, second.
28template<bool B, typename Iftrue, typename Iffalse>
29struct conditional
30{
31  typedef Iftrue type;
32};
33
34template<typename Iftrue, typename Iffalse>
35struct conditional<false, Iftrue, Iffalse>
36{
37  typedef Iffalse type;
38};
39
40
41} // namespace vsip::impl
42} // namespace vsip
43
44#endif
